mapper.select: SELECT r.id AS recruitId, r.title AS title, r.start_date AS startDate, r.end_date AS endDate, r.salary AS salary, r.location AS location, r.job AS job, r.work_form AS workForm, r.skills AS skills, r.career AS career, c.id AS companyId, c.company_name AS companyName, d.content AS content FROM recruitment r JOIN company c ON r.company_id = c.id JOIN rct_detail d ON r.id = d.recruitment_id WHERE r.id = #{id};
